text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Call of Duty: Warzone, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the ASUS ROG STRIX Scar Edition 120 Hz Display GL503VD-EB72 15.6" Gaming Laptop, Intel Core i7-7700HQ Processor (up to 3.8 GHz), GTX 1050 4 GB, 8 GB DDR4, 128 GB PCIEG3x4 NVMe SSD + 1 TB Hybrid Drive. The keyboard is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Starfield. The build quality of the ASUS ROG STRIX Scar Edition 120 Hz Display GL503VD-EB72 15.6" Gaming Laptop, Intel Core i7-7700HQ Processor (up to 3.8 GHz), GTX 1050 4 GB, 8 GB DDR4, 128 GB PCIEG3x4 NVMe SSD + 1 TB Hybrid Drive is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the ASUS ROG STRIX Scar Edition 120 Hz Display GL503VD-EB72 15.6" Gaming Laptop, Intel Core i7-7700HQ Processor (up to 3.8 GHz), GTX 1050 4 GB, 8 GB DDR4, 128 GB PCIEG3x4 NVMe SSD + 1 TB Hybrid Drive is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the ASUS ROG STRIX Scar Edition 120 Hz Display GL503VD-EB72 15.6" Gaming Laptop, Intel Core i7-7700HQ Processor (up to 3.8 GHz), GTX 1050 4 GB, 8 GB DDR4, 128 GB PCIEG3x4 NVMe SSD + 1 TB Hybrid Drive is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

The ASUS ROG STRIX Scar Edition 120 Hz Display GL503VD-EB72 15.6" Gaming Laptop, Intel Core i7-7700HQ Processor (up to 3.8 GHz), GTX 1050 4 GB, 8 GB DDR4, 128 GB PCIEG3x4 NVMe SSD + 1 TB Hybrid Drive does what it says on the tin. Good for competitive gaming, but the speakers could be better. Had a minor issue with the initial setup taking longer than expected, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
